::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: challenge

## Challenge

Use the `paste()` function to concatenate the strings "hello" and "there" in R

::::::::::::::::::::: solution

## School Solution

```{r}
paste("hello", "there")
```

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Great! Now use `paste0()` to paste together "mono" and "rail" to make "monorail"

::::::::::::::::::::: solution

## Fast Solution

```{r}
paste0("mono", "rail")
```
